Body:
triples = format_triples([('a', ':instance', 'alpha'), ('a', ':ARG0', 'b'),
    ('b', ':instance', 'beta'), ('g', ':ARG0', 'a'), ('g', ':instance',
    'gamma'), ('g', ':ARG1', 'b')])
assert triples == """instance(a, alpha) ^
ARG0(a, b) ^
instance(b, beta) ^
ARG0(g, a) ^
instance(g, gamma) ^
ARG1(g, b)"""
